formatted_address: Versis, Persiaran Medini 2 SD 03-04 Versis Medini, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: The Infinite Learning Lab Sdn Bhd

reviews.text: This looks like a really fun and safe space for kids. I actually came here to go to East Ledang Management Office, that was on the top floor. But I saw lots of teenagers coming in and out of the building, laughing, playing, and also it looked like there were tutoring and study facilities with adult supervisors/tutors. People here were very friendly and kind. Everything looked clean and pleasant. However I think the East Ledang Management Office needs to be more clearly signed. There was no signboard or directions, and there were 2 sets of stairs going into different parts of the building. Some arrows showing which stairs to take would be very helpful!
Nice and clean place for tutoring and to study.

vicinity: Versis, Persiaran Medini 2 SD 03-04 Versis Medini, Iskandar Puteri
